alert.note: Alert for Lucas; Ottawa; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 8:10PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Ottawa, northeastern Wood and Lucas Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 810 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Adrian to 9 miles north of Swanton to near Wauseon. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Toledo, Swanton, Perrysburg, Oregon, Sylvania, Rossford, Waterville, Northwood, Whitehouse, Oak Harbor, Genoa, Holland, Maumee, Ottawa Hills, Walbridge, Millbury, Rocky Ridge, Clay Center, Berkey and Harbor View. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northwestern Ohio.
